naslov: Kuća u zelenilu (240m2) sa vrtom od 1500m2 +garaža - okolica Zaprešića (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Iznajmljuje se samostojeća kuća u zelenilu u okolici Zaprešića. Kuća ima 240 m2 stambene površine + 55 m2 terasa, sa vrtom od 1500 m2 VIRTUALNA ŠETNJA: https://www.360.zagreb4u.com/2455/ Kuća se nalazi na kraju slijepe ulice, na mirnoj lokaciji, u prirodi, nema direktno susjeda (sa prozora se vidi samo priroda). - panoramski pogled prema Medvednici i prema Sloveniji. - 3 min auto do autoput A2 (Zagreb/Graz/Split/Ljubljana) - 3 min auto do West Gate shopping mall - 15 min from Samobor - 25 min do Trg Ban-Jelačić - 240m2 površina + 55m2 (2 terasa) - Vrt ima 1500 m2 s velikim stablima - 3 sobe - 1 walk in soba - 2 kupaone (1 jacuzzi) - 1 kuhinja - 2 dnevna boravka - 1 ured - 2 terase - 2 garaže Grijanje na gradski plin i solarni panel (topla voda) Trojslojno staklo, alumnijska stolarija, dobro izolirana (12 cm) Nadzorne kamere i alarm. Iznamljivanje sa namještajem. Od kućnih ljubimaca dopušteni su mali psi do 5kg, veliki psi i mačke nisu. REŽIJE I TROŠKOVI: režije su ukupno oko 200 eur, a osim njih se od travnja do listopada (uključujući ta dva mjeseca) plaća mjesečno 50 eur za košnju i uređenje vrta. UOBIČAJENI UVJETI NAJMA: * Ugovor na rok od minimalno godinu dana * Plaćanje: 1 mjesec unaprijed * Sigurnosni polog: 2 MJESEČNE NAJAMNINE AGENT: Darko 095 351 2309 ili darko@zagreb4u.com AGENCIJSKA PROVIZIJA OD NAJMOPRIMCA: 1 MJESEČNA NAJAMNINA + PDV --------------------------------------------------------- House for rent in the countryside in the vicinity of Zaprešić city. The house has 240 m2 of living space + 55 m2 terrace, with a garden of 1500 m2 VIRTUAL TOUR: https://www.360.zagreb4u.com/2455/ The house is located at the end of a dead-end street, in a quiet location, in nature, there are no direct neighbors (only nature can be seen from the windows). - panoramic view towards Medvednica and towards Slovenia. - 3 min car to the A2 motorway (Zagreb / ​​Graz / Split / Ljubljana) - 3 min drive to West Gate shopping mall - 15 min from Samobor - 25 min to Ban-Jelačić Square - 240m2 area + 55m2 (2 terraces) - The garden has 1500 m2 with large trees - 3 rooms - 1 dressing - 2 bathrooms (1 jacuzzi) - 1 kitchen - 2 log stay - 1 office - 2 terraces - 2 garages City gas heating and solar panel (hot water) Triple glazing, aluminum joinery, well insulated (12 cm) Surveillance cameras and alarm. Renting with the furniture. Small dogs up to 5 kg are allowed as pets, large dogs and cats are not. OVERHEADS AND COSTS: total overheads are around 200 euros, and in addition to them, from April to October (including those two months) there is a monthly payment of 50 euros for mowing and landscaping the garden. USUAL ​​TERMS OF RENT: * Contract for a minimum period of one year * Payment: 1 month in advance * Security deposit: 2 MONTHLY RENTS AGENT: Darko +385 95 351 2309 or darko@zagreb4u.com AGENCY FEE FROM LESSEE: 1 MONTHLY RENT + VAT
